Detailed Description

The XLCellValueProxy class is used for proxy (or placeholder) objects for XLCellValue objects.

The XLCellValueProxy class is used for proxy (or placeholder) objects for XLCellValue objects. The purpose is to enable implicit conversion during assignment operations. XLCellValueProxy objects can not be constructed manually by the user, only through XLCell objects.
